sentences.en: A holiday isn't an optional extra. In this stressful, frantic world it's a must.
sentences.cn: 休假并非可有可无。在这个紧张而忙碌的世界，它是必不可少的。

sentences.en: A wide range of emotionally stressful events may trigger a relapse.
sentences.cn: 多种令人情绪紧张的事情都可能引起旧病复发.

sentences.en: Also recognize the stressful situations that you cannot alter at this time.
sentences.cn: 与此同时,还要认识到有些压力是你眼下无法改变的.

sentences.en: For many of us, the festive season can be one of the most stressful times of the year.
sentences.cn: 对我们很多人来说，圣诞期间可能是一年中压力最大的时候。

sentences.en: I think I've got one of the most stressful jobs there is.
sentences.cn: 我想我得到的这份工作是其中最繁重的工作之一。

sentences.en: It usually just makes situations more stressful.
sentences.cn: 它通常会使情况更加紧迫.

sentences.en: It's a very stressful situation for everyone concerned.
sentences.cn: 对所有相关人士来说，这一形势非常紧张。

sentences.en: Many people thrive on a stressful lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 有许多人喜欢充满压力的生活方式。

sentences.en: Most doctors and nurses live under stressful conditions.
sentences.cn: 大多数医生和护士都承受着很大的压力。

sentences.en: Moving to a new house is a very stressful experience.
sentences.cn: 搬新家是件很劳心的事。

sentences.en: Parenting can be a stressful business.
sentences.cn: 为人父母会是一件压力很大的事。

sentences.en: Some people have to lead stressful lifestyles out of necessity.
sentences.cn: 一些人迫于生计不得不过着紧张忙碌的生活。

sentences.en: Somehow they found a less stressful setup than reactor meltdown.
sentences.cn: 他们会无缘无故的搞些没像反应堆灾难那么紧迫的操作.

sentences.en: Take a short break and leave a stressful situation.
sentences.cn: 休息一会儿放松下紧张的神经.

sentences.en: Teaching can be a tiring and stressful job.
sentences.cn: 当教师是件辛苦紧张的工作.

sentences.en: The white - collar workers live a stressful life every day.
sentences.cn: 白领 工人的生活每天都充满压力.

words.tran_cn: 压力；强调；紧张；重要性；重读
强调；使紧张；加压力于；用重音读

trans.tran_en: a job, experience, or situation that is stressful makes you worry a lot
